description: A fully emergent, unconstrained multi-agent conversation with no predefined roles.

agents.name: agent1
agents.system_message: You are an autonomous agent. You may respond however you like. Do NOT say FINAL.

agents.system_message: You are an autonomous agent. When you believe the conversation is complete, say FINAL on its own line.
